subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Petr Sykora scored the only goal in a shootout Saturday night to give the Pittsburgh Penguins a come-from-behind 4-3 victory over the host Islanders.
snippet: Petr Sykora scored the only goal in a shootout Saturday night to give the Pittsburgh Penguins a come-from-behind 4-3 victory over the host Islanders.
